abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of ghosts that damage enemy units in a line.
abilities.notes: The ghosts travel 800 units forward from Death Prophet's position, at a speed of 1100.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Silences target enemies, preventing them from casting spells.
abilities.notes: Silences all enemy units in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Places a spirit on an enemy unit, draining its life over time. Death Prophet restores health equal to the damage dealt. Has multiple charges.
abilities.notes: The siphon breaks if Death Prophet or the target moves too far apart. Base slow is increased by 1% for each 5 units of distance between Death Prophet and the target.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Unleashes evil spirits that drain the life of nearby enemy units and buildings. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed based on the damage dealt.
abilities.notes: Death Prophet is healed for 70% of the damage dealt by the spirits when they return. Spirits move at a speed of 500 and have a 700 range.

innate_abilities.name: Witchcraft
innate_abilities.description: Grants self bonus movement speed and cooldown reduction per hero level.
innate_abilities.notes: Provides increasing movement speed and cooldown reduction as Death Prophet levels up.
